attributes.action: Make school summer holidays much longer
attributes.background: Lots of children like going on holidays in the summer and when they do they go for longer periods than the standard 6 weeks. Six weeks isn’t much as for young kids time flys by and before they know it , they would have to go back to school again.

rejection.details: The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils.
